ThingDef.label: empty incubator
ThingDef.description: This animal incubator is empty. Use the Gene Pod and different genetic material vials to fill it.

ThingDef.label: boomalope / bear incubator
ThingDef.description: An incubator filled with a mixture of animal genetic material

ThingDef.label: boomalope / bear incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo may develop into a Boomalope / Bear or Bear / Boomalope hybrid
